DPRK Ambassador to Peru Appointed 
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Son Uk has been appointed DPRK ambassador e. p. to Peru, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.content:
Greetings to Sudanese President
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Sudanese President Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir on the occasion of the 16th day of the revolution in Sudan.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop, the message sincerely wished the president and people of Sudan successes in their efforts to achieve territorial integrity.

Greetings to President of Democratic Congo
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA)-- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to President of the Democratic Republic of Congo Joseph Kabila on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the president great success in his work for national unity and the prosperity of the country.
